mn68:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosalesu viharati naḷakapāne palāsavane.
mn68:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā abhiññātā abhiññātā kulaputtā bhagavantaṁ uddissa saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā honti—
mn68:3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto abbhokāse nisinno hoti.
mn68:3.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā te kulaputte ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn68:3.3_2: kulaputtā mamaṁ uddissa saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā, kacci te,
mn68:3.4_0: Evaṁ vutte, te bhikkhū tuṇhī ahesuṁ.
mn68:3.5_0: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā te kulaputte ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn68:3.6_2: kulaputtā mamaṁ uddissa saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā, kacci te,
mn68:3.7_0: Dutiyampi kho te bhikkhū tuṇhī ahesuṁ.
mn68:3.8_0: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā te kulaputte ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn68:3.9_2: kulaputtā mamaṁ uddissa saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā, kacci te,
mn68:3.10_0: Tatiyampi kho te bhikkhū tuṇhī ahesuṁ.
mn68:4.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ āmantesi:
mn68:5.2_2: tumhākaṁ patirūpaṁ kulaputtānaṁ saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitānaṁ yaṁ tumhe abhirameyyātha brahmacariye.
mn68:5.3_2: bhadrena yobbanena samannāgatā paṭhamena vayasā susukāḷakesā kāme paribhuñjeyyātha tena tumhe,
mn68:5.3_4: bhadrenapi yobbanena samannāgatā paṭhamena vayasā susukāḷakesā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā.
mn68:5.5_0: Api ca khomhi otiṇṇo jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
mn68:5.6_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethāti—
mn68:5.7_0: nanu tumhe, anuruddhā, evaṁ saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā”ti?
mn68:6.1_0: “Evaṁ pabbajitena ca pana, anuruddhā, kulaputtena kimassa karaṇīyaṁ?
mn68:6.2_2: kāmehi vivekaṁ akusalehi dhammehi pītisukhaṁ nādhigacchati aññaṁ vā tato santataraṁ,
mn68:6.2_5: thinamiddhampi cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati uddhaccakukkuccampi cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
mn68:6.3_2: kāmehi vivekaṁ akusalehi dhammehi pītisukhaṁ nādhigacchati aññaṁ vā tato santataraṁ.
mn68:6.4_2: kāmehi vivekaṁ akusalehi dhammehi pītisukhaṁ adhigacchati aññaṁ vā tato santataraṁ,
mn68:6.4_3: tassa abhijjhāpi cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
mn68:6.5_2: kāmehi vivekaṁ akusalehi dhammehi pītisukhaṁ adhigacchati aññaṁ vā tato santataraṁ.
mn68:7.2_0: ‘ye āsavā saṅkilesikā ponobbhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇiyā,
mn68:7.4_0: “Na kho no, bhante, bhagavati evaṁ hoti:
mn68:7.5_0: ‘ye āsavā saṅkilesikā ponobbhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇiyā,
mn68:7.7_0: Evaṁ kho no, bhante, bhagavati hoti:
mn68:7.8_0: ‘ye āsavā saṅkilesikā ponobbhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇiyā,
mn68:7.11_2: ye āsavā saṅkilesikā ponobbhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇiyā,
mn68:7.11_3: pahīnā te ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
mn68:7.12_0: Seyyathāpi, anuruddhā, tālo matthakacchinno abhabbo punavirūḷhiyā;
mn68:7.13_2: tathāgatassa ye āsavā saṅkilesikā ponobbhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇiyā,
mn68:7.13_3: pahīnā te ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā;
mn68:8.2_0: kaṁ atthavasaṁ sampassamāno tathāgato sāvake abbhatīte kālaṅkate upapattīsu byākaroti:
mn68:9.1_2: tathāgato janakuhanatthaṁ na janalapanatthaṁ na lābhasakkārasilokānisaṁsatthaṁ na ‘iti maṁ jano jānātū’ti
mn68:9.3_0: Santi ca kho, anuruddhā, kulaputtā saddhā uḷāravedā uḷārapāmojjā.
mn68:9.4_0: Te taṁ sutvā tadatthāya cittaṁ upasaṁharanti.
mn68:9.5_0: Tesaṁ taṁ, anuruddhā, hoti dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāya.
mn68:10.5_0: So kho panassa āyasmā sāmaṁ diṭṭho vā hoti anussavassuto vā:
mn68:10.7_0: So tassa saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussaranto tadatthāya cittaṁ upasaṁharati.
mn68:10.8_0: Evampi kho, anuruddhā, bhikkhuno phāsuvihāro hoti.
mn68:11.4_0: pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā’ti.
mn68:11.5_0: So kho panassa āyasmā sāmaṁ diṭṭho vā hoti anussavassuto vā:
mn68:11.7_0: So tassa saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussaranto tadatthāya cittaṁ upasaṁharati.
mn68:11.8_0: Evampi kho, anuruddhā, bhikkhuno phāsuvihāro hoti.
mn68:12.4_0: tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanuttā sakadāgāmī sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karissatī’ti.
mn68:12.5_0: So kho panassa āyasmā sāmaṁ diṭṭho vā hoti anussavassuto vā:
mn68:12.7_0: So tassa saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussaranto tadatthāya cittaṁ upasaṁharati.
mn68:12.8_0: Evampi kho, anuruddhā, bhikkhuno phāsuvihāro hoti.
mn68:13.4_0: tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’ti.
mn68:13.5_0: So kho panassa āyasmā sāmaṁ diṭṭho vā hoti anussavassuto vā:
mn68:13.7_0: So tassa saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussaranto tadatthāya cittaṁ upasaṁharati.
mn68:13.8_0: Evampi kho, anuruddhā, bhikkhuno phāsuvihāro hoti.
mn68:14.5_0: Sā kho panassā bhaginī sāmaṁ diṭṭhā vā hoti anussavassutā vā:
mn68:14.7_0: Sā tassā saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussarantī tadatthāya cittaṁ upasaṁharati.
mn68:14.8_0: Evampi kho, anuruddhā, bhikkhuniyā phāsuvihāro hoti.
mn68:15.4_0: pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyinī anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā’ti.
mn68:15.5_0: Sā kho panassā bhaginī sāmaṁ diṭṭhā vā hoti anussavassutā vā:
mn68:15.7_0: Sā tassā saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussarantī tadatthāya cittaṁ upasaṁharati.
mn68:15.8_0: Evampi kho, anuruddhā, bhikkhuniyā phāsuvihāro hoti.
mn68:16.4_0: tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanuttā sakadāgāminī sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karissatī’ti.
mn68:16.5_0: Sā kho panassā bhaginī sāmaṁ diṭṭhā vā hoti anussavassutā vā:
mn68:16.7_0: Sā tassā saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussarantī tadatthāya cittaṁ upasaṁharati.
mn68:16.8_0: Evampi kho, anuruddhā, bhikkhuniyā phāsuvihāro hoti.
mn68:17.4_0: tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā’ti.
mn68:17.5_0: Sā kho panassā bhaginī sāmaṁ diṭṭhā vā hoti anussavassutā vā:
mn68:17.7_0: Sā tassā saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussarantī tadatthāya cittaṁ upasaṁharati.
mn68:17.8_0: Evampi kho, anuruddhā, bhikkhuniyā phāsuvihāro hoti.
mn68:18.4_0: pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā’ti.
mn68:18.5_0: So kho panassa āyasmā sāmaṁ diṭṭho vā hoti anussavassuto vā:
mn68:18.7_0: So tassa saddhañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussaranto tadatthāya cittaṁ upasaṁharati.
mn68:18.8_0: Evampi kho, anuruddhā, upāsakassa phāsuvihāro hoti.
mn68:19.4_0: tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanuttā sakadāgāmī sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karissatī’ti.
mn68:19.5_0: So kho panassa āyasmā sāmaṁ diṭṭho vā hoti anussavassuto vā:
mn68:19.7_0: So tassa saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussaranto tadatthāya cittaṁ upasaṁharati.
mn68:19.8_0: Evampi kho, anuruddhā, upāsakassa phāsuvihāro hoti.
mn68:20.4_0: tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’ti.
mn68:20.5_0: So kho panassa āyasmā sāmaṁ diṭṭho vā hoti anussavassuto vā:
mn68:20.7_0: So tassa saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussaranto tadatthāya cittaṁ upasaṁharati.
mn68:20.8_0: Evampi kho, anuruddhā upāsakassa phāsuvihāro hoti.
mn68:21.4_0: pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyinī anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā’ti.
mn68:21.5_0: Sā kho panassā bhaginī sāmaṁ diṭṭhā vā hoti anussavassutā vā:
mn68:21.7_0: Sā tassā saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussarantī tadatthāya cittaṁ upasaṁharati.
mn68:21.8_0: Evampi kho, anuruddhā, upāsikāya phāsuvihāro hoti.
mn68:22.4_0: tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanuttā sakadāgāminī sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karissatī’ti.
mn68:22.5_0: Sā kho panassā bhaginī sāmaṁ diṭṭhā vā hoti anussavassutā vā:
mn68:22.7_0: Sā tassā saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussarantī tadatthāya cittaṁ upasaṁharati.
mn68:22.8_0: Evampi kho, anuruddhā, upāsikāya phāsuvihāro hoti.
mn68:23.4_0: tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā’ti.
mn68:23.5_0: Sā kho panassā bhaginī sāmaṁ diṭṭhā vā hoti anussavassutā vā:
mn68:23.7_0: Sā tassā saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussarantī tadatthāya cittaṁ upasaṁharati.
mn68:23.8_0: Evampi kho, anuruddhā, upāsikāya phāsuvihāro hoti.
mn68:24.1_2: tathāgato na janakuhanatthaṁ na janalapanatthaṁ na lābhasakkārasilokānisaṁsatthaṁ na ‘iti maṁ jano jānātū’ti
mn68:24.3_0: Santi ca kho, anuruddhā, kulaputtā saddhā uḷāravedā uḷārapāmojjā.
mn68:24.4_0: Te taṁ sutvā tadatthāya cittaṁ upasaṁharanti.
mn68:24.5_0: Tesaṁ taṁ, anuruddhā, hoti dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
mn68:24.7_0: Attamano āyasmā anuruddho bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
